title: Language Proficiency Enhancement Program Through Student Volunteer Initiatives (K-12)

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language communication skills and understanding of fundamental volunteer service concepts
context.additional_context: Practical language education in a smartphone-based microlearning environment, aiming to cultivate real-world language application skills through volunteer activities within limited budgets

learning_goals: Learners can identify and describe at least three language use strategies by analyzing volunteer activity case studies
Learners can create one language communication scenario for solving community problems using mobile learning tools
Learners can self-evaluate that they have achieved over 80% of their language competencies according to post-volunteer activity assessment rubrics

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
